#Top Batsmen
import math

T = int(raw_input())    

#Helper Function

def comb(n, r):
    return math.factorial(n)/(math.factorial(n-r) * math.factorial(r))

while(T):
    T = T - 1
    
    x = [int(item) for item in raw_input().split()]

    x = sorted(x, reverse = True)
    k = int(raw_input())
    x1 = x[:k]
    l = list(set(x1))

    c = 1
    for i in l:
        c = c * comb(x.count(i), x1.count(i))

    print c
